title: Tondemo Nezumi Daikatsuyaku (The Legend of Manxmouse)
synopsis: This animated story features Manxmouse, the mouse that looks like a rabbit, and all because of his ears. Join in the adventures in this delightful story.
staff: [['Saitou, Hiroshi', ['Director', ' Script']], ['Mori, Yasuji', ['Character Design']], ['Momose, Yoshiyuki', ['Animation Director', ' Character Design']], ['Yukimuro, Shunichi', ['Screenplay']]]
